title: VehicleActivity
description: Activity is superclass for mission, pickup, dropoff, etc that a vehicle performs as an item in its schedule

id.description: Stable alphanumeric reference that is unique

type.description: Type of activity [mission, pickup, dropoff, pullin, pullout, pause]

status.description: Status of the activity. Different statuses depending on type of activity

datetime.description: ISO 8601. Reflects the current UTC time.

traceId.description: Alphanumeric reference generated by the publisher of the event
